rule: All descriptions must be written in English, utilizing correct grammar and vocabulary appropriate for detailed visual descriptions.
input: An elegant ballroom adorned with chandeliers, intricate wall patterns, and well-dressed attendees, meticulously described in fluent English.
coverage: Elegant, well-dressed attendees gracefully dance in a lavish ballroom adorned with sparkling chandeliers and intricate wall patterns. Set during an evening gala, warm, ambient lighting casts a soft glow, highlighting the ornate decor and creating shimmering reflections on the polished floor. Large windows reveal a twilight sky, enhancing the sophisticated atmosphere. The opulent setting evokes a sense of grandeur and timeless celebration, fostering an inviting and enchanting ambiance for viewers.
